name: Giant 2048
description:
Get ready for the sweetest AND biggest 2048 puzzle game ever created! Help Lilly feed her best friend the lovely giant with tasty candies.

Use the slingshot to merge the candies with matching numbers into one big candy. Try to create huge combos by merging more than one candy at a time to feed even MORE candy. But watch out, rocks will appear on the field blocking the candies. They can easily be destroyed by merging candies beside them, but don't underestimate those solid blockers!

So grab your slingshot and prepare for the greatest 2048 game of all time!
